Name: Aku Aku
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry and mint sprigs.
BLEND all ingredients with a 4oz scoop of crushed ice.
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass (help through sieve with a bar spoon).
Garnish with skewered pineapple wedge, cherry and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: This Tiki classic looks a little like frozen stagnant pond water but tastes minty fresh and rather good.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (revised edition) .
